question: What is the colour of the strip to be affixed in all BS 6 compliant four-wheel motor vehicles?
explanation:
As per the recent notification of the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, a one cm green sticker, providing registration details will be affixed in all BS 6 compliant motor vehicles.
The order is expected to come force from October 1, 2020. Last year, it was announced that all motor vehicles will be fitted with tamper-proof, high security registration plates (HSRP). This green strip will be fixed at the top in the HSRP on the inside of the windshield. This is in addition to the light blue sticker for petrol or CNG and orange sticker for diesel vehicle.
